messages.subject: Re: Soap Making via vegetarian means
messages.msgSnippet: Aleasa, are you on Many Paths??  I would think Nubs or Ria would have a site.  If you aren t, I will ask for you. Lynda ... From: Aleasa J. Helsinger
messages.messageBody:
Aleasa, are you on Many Paths?? I would think Nubs or Ria would have a
site. If you aren't, I will ask for you.

Lynda

----------
> From: Aleasa J. Helsinger <leestore@...>
> To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
> Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Soap Making via vegetarian means
> Date: Thursday, February 17, 2000 8:58 PM
>
From: "Aleasa J. Helsinger" <leestore@...>

My 17yo dd (who is a devoted vegetarian) wishes to make soap using no
animal fats. I have several soap making books, but they only mention some
substitutions, not the actual "recipe". She is really interested in those
with an herbal flare and having never tried this before we really need
something tried and true. If anyone has suggestions for either websites or
books I would greatly appreciate your input!
TIA, Aleasa

messages.messageBody:
My 17yo dd (who is a devoted vegetarian) wishes to make soap using no animal fats. I have several soap making books, but they only mention some substitutions, not the actual "recipe". She is really interested in those with an herbal flare and having never tried this before we really need something tried and true. If anyone has suggestions for either websites or books I would greatly appreciate your input!
TIA, Aleasa
